answers.answer: maybe anxiety? think about whether or not you've been worrying about something a lot lately.
could be stress related, but it could also be diabetes, if its persists, or gets worse, go to a doctor and see if any blood tests show up anything.

question: Hi im a 15 yo boy and have been feeling dizzy, having headaches, tired and labored breathing for the past couple weeks. I also have a cold so it could be that or sumthin else. Am i just paranoid? Please, advice would be greatly imprecated.
title: always feeling dizzy, headaches, and heavy breathing. HELP!
